name: Concealed Adventures
description:
Can you help lucid (web version character) and gleam(iOS version character) find each other. Move through a cave more dangerous than a hungry lion. Fatal obstacles difficult to spot will to restrict you on the challenging journey.  Download the game and give it a try now!. 

This game is developed by Krish, a 14 year-old boy and Soham, a 13-year old boy.
